alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:49AM CST until January 05 at 8:05AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River At Benton. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Pastures along west bank will flood. There may be some low lying county roads near the river flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 20.0 feet by late this afternoon, January 3. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date Saline River Benton 18.0 17.1 Tue 7 AM 16.3 8.8 7.8 20.0 5 PM 1/03 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
